title:
#30daybleachchallenge   What's your favorite character from the 13 Court Guard Squads?

Day 5 - Favorite...

object.content:
#30daybleachchallenge   What's your favorite character from the 13 Court Guard Squads?

Day 5 - Favorite Character from Gotei 13 : Hitsugaya Toshiro. He's the most admirable, because he's almost always cool-headed and calm. He's the youngest, so that's really cool how he got to be a captain that young. 

Anyone like this look better than the new one? What's with the band/scarf around his head?

~Smitha
I like Jushiro Ukitake quite a bit.
Kenpachi is really awesome for someone who's sword doesn't function.
Ichigo is a boss...but Toshiro is still really cool!
Same. Love ice types and the strongest Zan. I like the look he has there than the bandana look. dont care for it.
Aizen Sosuke. Technically, he's no longer a member of the gotei 13, but he's still a shinigami.
I like... Toshiro, kenpachi, Renji, Rukia, Matsumoto, Byakuya, Ukitake, Yachiru, and many others haha
Yes in dead he is you now who a straight up bad ass Kenpachi Zaraki >: ) ha ha  :D

Rukia, Toushiro, Kenpachi, Byakuya, Ukitake.
And a lot more.... xD
Dude that's wut I just said +Rakshanda Samin Suhaa
+Yoshino Cherry Not exactly, but close, it seems.... xD
Sure...uh-huh... Naw jk lol yeah ur right... It's almost the same
lol you now what i can fix this bleach is awesome lol their XD
it looks like he's taking the piss out of someone and going meh meh meh
I was listening to music, and his mouth move perfectly with the words.
He's so awesome that he's my profile pic
Shunsui, Shuhei, Renji in that order
he should be lieutenant because  he cant even keep his bankai that long
+Dj Cash By that Logic Kenpachi shouldn't even be in a squad he doesn't even know his swords name.
+Dj Cash Because it's so damn overpowered plus by the time of the final fight he could keep it for like 1 hour or more....

Kenpachi, Toshiro, and Ichigo...and Hollow Ichigo XD

...and Grimmjow :3
And ulquirro also...even though hes not from Gotei 13.... :P
kyoraku shunsui!!!! who said real men can't wear pink?!!! huh? btw,  anyone suspecting what his ban kai will be like?
member that time when he refused to go through the ceiling and went through the window to get to Ichigo's? ;)
